Paper.Title: Realizing Expressions of Doubt in Collaborative Dialogue *

Section.Paragraph: One way to 1)egin a negotiation subdialogue is to express doubt at a proposition. However, expressions of doubt occur in a variety of forms, each of which conveys information about the nature of the doubt that is important for the subsequent resolution of the conflict. This paper presents our work on realizing expressions of doubt appropriately in natural language dialogues.
